alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will combine with additional light snowfall to cause heavy drifting of snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...The Blackfoot Mountains, including the towns of Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, and Bone. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow can hamper efforts to keep roads and highways clear. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
